name: Period extraction for time series segmentation (example: human gait)
description: We extract fundamental periods trough cutting the trajectory of principal components.
author: Anastasia Motrenko
affiliation: Moscow Institute of physics and Technology
inputs: Data .mat file should contain time series. If the input file is not selected or is of invalid format, the test file will be used
course: Machine Learning and Data Analysis (Strijov's practice)/Group 874, Spring 2014
